Looking for places to spread our joy.
Contact us if you have something.

So, propering a 20 month old release? Well,
with the release of the new Batman movie we
noticed a lot people wanted to see this one
again. DEFiNiTiON release is out of sync,
proof is in the sample dir. This one is for all
our fans out there, we've heard we have quite a
few. Enjoy!

On another note. Props to hV for doing those
Torchwood rips. We have had a hard time deinterlacing
those from the BluRay discs.

Proper reason: bad crop

infamous cropped the whole movie to 2.4:1
however there are several imax sequences with
an AR of 1.78:1, which means infamous cut off
around 200 pixels from those sequences.
Check the screenshot in sample folder.
This of course means there are scenes with and
without black borders. This is the way it's
supposed to be, not an error.
And if you are wondering why you didn't notice
any AR changes on the DVD, it's only on the Bluray.
